    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Body
    Stores and updates physical information about a body.
    BodyBuilder
    A builder class for creating instances of the Body class.
    BodyFactory
    Factory class that provides default celestial bodies with realistic properties.
    BodyHistory
    The BodyHistory class provides a mechanism for tracking the position, velocity, and acceleration history of a physics body over a fixed number of time steps.
    BodyHistory.State
    Immutable record representing a complete state snapshot of a body at a point in time.
    CollisionDetector
    The CollisionDetector class is responsible for detecting collisions between celestial bodies in the physics simulation.
    CollisionEvent
    The CollisionEvent class represents a collision between two celestial bodies in the simulation.
    Draw
    Class to create all the drawings and graphics.
    DrawSpace
    Class to handle the JFrame and JPanel.
    EnterRotation
    Class to handle user interaction through clicking the mouse, relating to rotation movements.
    ExplicitEulerIntegrator
    Implementation of the Integrator interface using the Explicit Euler method.
    FormatText
    Class to store methods dealing with text and strings to be displayed on screen.
    Graphics3D
    Static class to handle conversion between 3D and 2D graphics.
    GravityCalculator
    The GravityCalculator class calculates gravitational forces between celestial bodies in the simulation using Newton's law of universal gravitation.
    Integrator
    The Integrator interface defines the numerical integration methods used to simulate the motion of celestial bodies in a physics simulation.
    Keymaps
    Class to create and manage keymaps and their corresponding actions.
    Line
    Stores information about a line to draw.
    Main
    The Main class serves as the top-level runner for the solar system simulation.
    Physics
    The Physics class manages all physical interactions between celestial bodies in the simulation.
    Point
    Stores information about a 3D point to be drawn.
    Rotation
    Class to handle user interaction through mouse movement and dragging.
    Setup
    The Setup class manages configuration and initialization for the simulation.
    Setup.PropertiesException
    Represents an exception that occurs during the processing of properties.
    Setup.PropertyFileNotFoundException
    Represents an exception that occurs when a property file is not found.
    Setup.PropertyFormatException
    Represents an exception that occurs when a property is not formatted correctly.
    Setup.PropertyNotFoundException
    Represents an exception that occurs when a property is not found in a properties file.
    SymplecticEulerIntegrator
    Implementation of the Integrator interface using the Symplectic Euler method, also known as Semi-implicit Euler method.
    TimeManager
    The TimeManager class manages time-related aspects of the simulation.
    TimeManager.TimeScaleChangeType
    Represents the types of possible changes to the timescale cap in the simulation.
    TimeStep
    The TimeStep class manages the temporal progression of the physics simulation.
    Vector3D
    The Vector3D class represents a three-dimensional vector with x, y, and z components.
    VerletIntegrator
    Implementation of the Integrator interface using the Velocity Verlet algorithm.
    Zooming
    Class to handle user interaction through mouse wheel rotation.
